alert.note: Alert for Lunenburg; Mecklenburg (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 8:01PM EDT until May 13 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Mecklenburg County in south central Virginia... Southwestern Lunenburg County in south central Virginia... * Until 845 PM EDT. * At 801 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kells Corner, or 8 miles south of Keysville, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Kells Corner and Rehoboth around 810 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Gary, Plantersville, Wilburn, Blevins Corner, Loves Mill, North View, Fort Mitchell, Finneywood and Wightman. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
